CodeBlockMethod.Name: description
CodeBlockMethod.Code: -- /ui/SkillUI/SkillInfo/SkillSets/SkillSlot_1/Skill/Upgrade -- Basement 건물 동작 -- Skill UI에서 스킬 업그레이드 버튼 관련 동작 -- 업그레이드 버튼을 누르면 인벤토리에서 동일 스킬 아이템 하나를 소모하면서 스킬을 1만큼 업그레이드 -- 일정 수치 이상 스킬을 업그레이드 하면 스킬 성능 향상

CodeBlockEntityEventHandler.Name: HandleButtonClickEvent
CodeBlockEntityEventHandler.Code:
-- Parameters local Entity = event.Entity --------------------------------------------------------
-- 스킬 업그레이드 버튼을 누를 때의 동작
local LocalPlayer = _UserService.LocalPlayer local SkillInfoUI = _EntityService:GetEntityByPath("/ui/SkillUI/SkillInfo") local CalledBy = SkillInfoUI.SkillUIManager.CalledBy
-- 건물이 부숴졌을 경우 UI 동작이 무효하므로 UI를 강제로 끔 if not isvalid(CalledBy) then SkillInfoUI:SetVisible(false) SkillInfoUI:SetEnable(false) return end
-- 건물과 플레이어간 거리가 3 이상이면 UI를 강제로 끔... 건물 근처에서만 업그레이드 하게끔 하기 위함 local PlayerPosition = Vector2(LocalPlayer.TransformComponent.Position.x, LocalPlayer.TransformComponent.Position.y) local BuildingPosition = Vector2(CalledBy.TransformComponent.Position.x, CalledBy.TransformComponent.Position.y)
if Vector2.Distance(PlayerPosition, BuildingPosition) > 3 then SkillInfoUI.SkillUIManager:SetUI(false) return end
local SkillEntity = Entity.Parent local SkillSlotEntity = SkillEntity.Parent local Index = tonumber(_UtilLogic:Split(SkillSlotEntity.Name, "_")[2])
local SkillSlot = LocalPlayer.PlayerAttackComponent.SkillSlots[Index] local IsSkillSet = LocalPlayer.PlayerAttackComponent.IsSkillSet[Index]
-- 해당 슬롯의 스킬이 Set 되어있는지 확인 if IsSkillSet then local ItemRef = SkillSlot["ItemRef"] local ItemCount = ItemRef.ItemCount
if ItemCount > 1 then local ItemName = SkillSlot["Name"]
LocalPlayer.ExtendInventoryComponent:RemoveItem(ItemName, 1) LocalPlayer.PlayerAttackComponent:UpgradeSkill(Index)
local UpgradeCount = SkillSlot["UpgradeCount"] + 1 local UpgradeMaxCount = SkillSlot["UpgradeMaxCount"] local SkillLevel = SkillSlot["SkillLevel"] local SkillCoeff = SkillSlot["SkillCoeff"] local EffectAmount = tonumber(SkillSlot["EffectAmount"]) local ItemLevel = ItemRef.ItemLevel
local SkillIconEntity = SkillEntity.Children[1] local SkillLevelEntity = SkillIconEntity.Children[1]
if UpgradeCount >= UpgradeMaxCount then SkillLevel = SkillLevel + 1 UpgradeCount = 0 UpgradeMaxCount = UpgradeMaxCount + 3 SkillCoeff = SkillCoeff * (1 + ItemLevel/10) * (1 + (SkillLevel - 1)/10) EffectAmount = EffectAmount * (1 + ItemLevel/10) * (1 + (SkillLevel - 1)/10)
SkillLevelEntity.TextComponent.Text = math.floor(SkillLevel) end
SkillSlot["UpgradeCount"] = UpgradeCount SkillSlot["UpgradeMaxCount"] = UpgradeMaxCount SkillSlot["SkillLevel"] = SkillLevel SkillSlot["SkillCoeff"] = SkillCoeff SkillSlot["EffectAmount"] = tostring(EffectAmount)
Entity.TextComponent.Text = "강화하기\n( " .. math.floor(UpgradeCount) .. " / " .. math.floor(UpgradeMaxCount) .. " )"
local ItemSlots = _EntityService:GetEntitiesByPath("/ui/SkillUI/SkillInfo/SkillInventory/ItemSlot")
-- 아이템 슬롯 갱신 for i, ItemSlot in pairs(ItemSlots) do if ItemSlot.SkillInfoButton.ItemName == ItemName then ItemSlot.Children[2].TextComponent.Text = tostring(ItemCount - 1) break; end end end end
